title: Warwick Nerf
body: warwick is ridiculously op, he needs to be nerfed.

replies.body: I disagree with the Nerf as it now makes him weaker in fields where he was not overpowered TT line, ARAMs, top and mid lane WW...

Warwick has not changed from before, but jungle and jungle items did.

Have you noticed how hard it is for anyone that's not Fiddle or Warwick to stay in jungle?
He's getting PBE nerfs but we'll have to wait until they're confirmed for next patch.

He is getting nerfs 

Warwick Ult Damage Nerf: 250/335/420 lowered to 150/250/350
Agreed. But apparently they're leaving him as is until they rework him.
Makes sense really. I hope they keep that rework for his ult where it's a skillshot that'll bounce him back if he misses.
Warwick should be nerfed. His late game is so powerful thats its completely unfair.{{champion:19}}
